Sprague, Katherine

div.p: Our learning community is dedicated to developing globally-minded, compassionate, resilient, and courageous students to learn and lead change in their world.

img.alt: Mill Valley School District Board Meeting Agendas over a picture of redwood trees

a.title: Go to comments for Board Meeting Agendas

img.alt: MVSD Remote Learning Messages, Resources, and More

div.p: Visit this link for all information and resources related to Remote Learning in MVSD.

a.title: Go to comments for MVSD Remote Learning

a.span: Notice of Public Meeting - Marin County SELPA Operational Steering Committee

div.p: Notice of public hearing: The Marin County Special Education Local Plan Area (SELPA) Operational Steering Committee/Governing Board hereby gives notice that a public hearing will be held.

a.title: Go to comments for Notice of Public Meeting - Marin County SELPA Operational Steering Committee

div.p: The May 14th Board of Trustees meeting will take place remotely.

a.title: Go to comments for Remote Board Meeting - May 14, 2020

img.alt: Remote Learning FAQ text with a graphic of a computer, iPad, and books

div.p: We will continue to update this page, answering your questions regarding remote learning during the COVID-19 closure.

a.title: Go to comments for Remote Learning FAQ

div.p: Please see all district coronavirus (COVID-19) updates.

a.title: Go to comments for All District Coronavirus Updates

img.alt: Facility Needs in the Mill Valley School District with photos of all 6 schools

a.span: Facility Needs in the Mill Valley School District Video & Survey

div.p: The Mill Valley School District has done extensive analysis of our school buildings and grounds and we are committed to the safety of our students and staff on our campuses. Please see the video for more information regarding the district's facility needs projected for the next 10 years and take our input survey.

a.title: Go to comments for Facility Needs in the Mill Valley School District Video & Survey

div.p: Please read our debrief of the 2/5/2020 incident near Edna Maguire Elementary School

a.title: Go to comments for 2/5/2020 Incident Debrief - Edna Maguire

div.p: Learn about Mill Valley School District's communications stats across various platforms, supporting Strategic Plan Objective 3: Communications

a.title: Go to comments for Communications Report: July to December 2019

a.span: Announcing Mill Valley School District's New Facility Rental Partnership with Facilitron

div.p: Mill Valley School District is pleased to announce a new online facility request and rental system designed to provide a positive user experience for all.

a.title: Go to comments for Announcing Mill Valley School District's New Facility Rental Partnership with Facilitron

a.aria-label: Go to Google map for Mill Valley School District

div.span: Title IX: Coordinator Contact Information: For complaints regarding Students, please contact Dr. Kimberly Berman, Superintendent, at kberman@mvschools.org or (415) 389-7705. In your communication, please state Title IX in the subject line. Equity Compliance Officer Contact Information: For complaints regarding Employees, please contact Dr. Kimberly Berman, Superintendent, at kberman@mvschools.org or (415) 389-7705. In your communication, please state Equity Compliance in the subject line.
